Text:
* Note: This torrent was posted on Oct, 26 2008 and reposted on Nov, 30 2009.


Some additional install notes by BigKarl_519 at 2008-12-24 03:50 CET: 

Thought this might help...

INSTRUCTIONS TO STOP ADOBE FROM CHECKlNG YOUR SERIAL AND DE-ACTIVATING IT

You will be opening a hidden file which needs special permission to open. With a 
special terminal command, the file will open automatically in TextEdit. You will 
add a few lines of text to the file, save and close. That's it. Pretty simple and 
totally not scary, huh? Ok so let's get to it:

Step 1 - If you're still going to install CS4, make sure you install it as a trial 
(do not enter a serial number). If you've already installed and have used one of 
the expiring serials, load any CS4 app, go to the Help menu and Deactivate. 
Quit any open CS4 apps.

Step 2 - Open Terminal (found in Applications/Utilities/). In the terminal window, 
paste in:

sudo /Applications/TextEdit.app/Contents/MacOS/TextEdit /etc/hosts

Step 3 - Hit return and type in your admin password.

Step 4 - A file will automatically open in TextEdit. In TextEdit, at the bottom of 
the document, hit return and paste in the following:

127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 practivate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sea.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wwis-dubc1-vip60.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sjc0.adobe.com

Step 5 - Save the file. Do NOT do a "Save As". Close the file.

Step 6 - If you're on OS X 10.4, reboot. If you're on OS X 10.5, in a new terminal 
window, paste in:

sudo dscacheutil -flushcache

Hit return and exit out of Terminal.

Step 7 - Launch any CS4 app and enter the serial from the keygen. The serial will 
last for decades.

As from at I can see this method is working with CS4 trials download via 
www.adobe.com

Hope this helps :)

Some additional install notes by ruggers88 at 2009-07-16 06:24 CET: 

I'll confirm that this works on Mac OS X 10.5.7.
If its not working for you, then you are probably doing something wrong.

1. Install Adobe software. When you get to the serial/trial page, stop. 

Step 2 - Open Terminal (Hit CMD+Spacebar > type in terminal). In the terminal window,
paste in:

sudo /Applications/TextEdit.app/Contents/MacOS/TextEdit /etc/hosts

Step 3 - Hit return and type in your admin password.

Step 4 - A file will automatically open in TextEdit. In TextEdit (if you don't have text edit you're in trouble.. go install it or some kind of text editor), at the bottom of
the document, hit return and paste in the following:

127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 practivate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sea.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wwis-dubc1-vip60.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sjc0.adobe.com

Step 5 - Save the file. Do NOT do a "Save As". Close the file.

Step 6 - If you're on OS X 10.5, in a NEW TERMINAL WINDOW (Hit CMD+N or go to Shell menu>New Window>Basic), paste in:

sudo dscacheutil -flushcache

Hit return and exit out of both Terminals.

Step 7 - Unrar the downloaded crack torrent, look for a readme.txt file inside ForceX folder. Scroll to the bottom, type in the serial from there.

Finished!

If there are any problems, reboot and try again. If you can't get past the serial, click trial first. Then when you launch the app for the first time you will come back to serial page, and redo the steps above.

Some additional install notes by canarycreations at 2009-10-09 05:33 CET: 

This may help those of you that are having problems. I installed this program and discovered that the easiest way to do all of this, open "Setup" once opened, click 30 day trial and proceed to do step 1-5 DURING setup. Once setup is COMPLETE, do the steps 6 AND 7 and either REBOOT (if your on 10.4) or do Step 7 (if your on 10.5). I found after this, I open the program, on a computer with MAC OSX 10.5 it just opens without asking for a serial and your cracked and good.. in MAC OSX 10.4 it asks for a serial so insert one from a Keygen and your golden.

Install Instructions FOR MAC-
Highly recommend Disconnecting from Internet while doing all this!!

Step 2 - Open Terminal (found in Applications/Utilities/). In the terminal window, paste in:

sudo /Applications/TextEdit.app/Contents/MacOS/TextEdit /etc/hosts

Step 3 - Hit return and type in your admin password.

Step 4 - A file will automatically open in TextEdit. (If it doesnt CHECK and see if you have a text editor, if you don't GET ONE) In TextEdit, at the bottom of the document, hit return and paste in the following:

127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 practivate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sea.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wwis-dubc1-vip60.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sjc0.adobe.com

Step 5 - Save the file. Do NOT do a "Save As". Close the file.

Step 6 - If youre on OS X 10.4, REBOOT. If you're on OS X 10.5, in a new terminal window, paste in:

sudo dscacheutil -flushcache

Hit return and type in your admin password [if asked again].
Step 7 - Launch any CS4 app and enter the serial from the keygen. The serial will last for decades.

4. When you launch again the program will attempt to activate itself by accessing Adobe's servers, but since you have modified the "hosts" file, it will simply redirect itself back to 127.0.0.1, which is your own computer. It will assume that activation is successful (it has been tricked!) and you may get the License Agreement box. Click accept and run.


IF ERROR OCCURS ON MAC -
For those who still get the error:

License for this product has stopped working
Error: 150:30

try this...

If you have modified the Host-file do the following steps, else jump to #6
#1 In Terminal type: sudo /Applications/TextEdit.app/Contents/MacOS/TextEdit /etc/hosts
#2 Hit return, enter your admin password when prompted and hit return.
#3 Your Hosts file should automatically open in TextEdit.
#4 _REMOVE_ the following from the open Hosts file:

127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 practivate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 3dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-2.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 adobe-dns-3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 ereg.wip3.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sea.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 wwis-dubc1-vip60.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate-sjc0.adobe.com

#5 Save the file and quit TextEdit and Terminal.

###START HERE### (if you have not been messing with the Host-file)
#6 In Terminal type following: sudo dscacheutil -flushcache
#7 Hit return, enter your admin password when prompted and hit return.
#8 In Terminal type following: sudo rm /Library/Application\ Support/Adobe/Adobe\ PCD/cache/*
#9 Close Terminal.
#10 Go to: http://www.adobe.com/support/contact/licensing_download_eula.html
#11 Download the licensing repair tool (at the bottom of the page).
#12 Run it, and follow on screen instructions, quit when done.

#13 Instal "Little Snitch" from www.obdev.at
#14 Restart your Mac
#15 Little Snitch will ask for permissions, allow most but when you notice an adobe application ALWAYS DENY!
#15 Run a CS4 application, you will now see

Ok, I'm a new MAC user, and this WORKS, but you have to follow the guidelines. I had issues  understanding the "terminal" stuff and to do what in what order. So check it. I succeeded first time, and I have the latest leopard software.

1.Download the program and set it up and STOP at the Trial/Serial page & TURN OFF INTERNET.

2. Open terminal and type what ROBBINGHOOD wrote. REMEMBER to watch THE SPACE between the letters, if you don't do it right it won't work. Then PASTE and SAVE all those number codes in the text window that opens.

3. Once you save, close terminal and the text window. THEN proceed to click TRIAL and select the programs you want. 

4. Once it's done, open photoshop and enter the serial, it's here somewhere LOL. I didn't use keygen on this torrent cause it's got a trojan. 

5. Done! I opened every program and they all worked, didn't get a customer agreement, which is beautiful. I opened more than 5 times and nothing. I CONNECTED to internet and tried opening again. NOTHING!! GOOD LUCK, GUYS!
